exercises.name: bench
exercises.description: Compound chest exercise that primarily targets chest with secondary triceps and front deltoid activation

exercises.name: squat
exercises.description: Compound leg exercise that primarily targets quadriceps with secondary glute and hamstring activation

exercises.name: deadlift
exercises.description: Compound posterior chain exercise that primarily targets hamstrings with secondary glute and back activation

exercises.name: row
exercises.description: Compound back exercise that primarily targets back muscles with secondary lat and bicep activation

exercises.name: ohp
exercises.description: Compound shoulder exercise that primarily targets front deltoids with secondary tricep and chest activation

exercises.name: hip-thrust
exercises.description: Isolation exercise that primarily targets glutes with secondary hamstring activation

exercises.name: hamstring-curl
exercises.description: Isolation exercise that specifically targets hamstrings

exercises.name: lat-raise
exercises.description: Isolation exercise that primarily targets front deltoids with light rear deltoid activation

exercises.name: calf-raise
exercises.description: Isolation exercise that specifically targets calf muscles

exercises.name: core
exercises.description: Core strengthening exercises including planks, crunches, and other abdominal movements

exercises.name: curl
exercises.description: Isolation exercise that specifically targets biceps

exercises.name: triceps
exercises.description: Isolation exercise that specifically targets triceps

exercises.name: pull-up
exercises.description: Compound upper body exercise that primarily targets back and lats with secondary bicep activation

exercises.name: dip
exercises.description: Compound upper body exercise that primarily targets triceps with secondary chest and front deltoid activation

exercises.name: lunge
exercises.description: Compound leg exercise that targets quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings with unilateral movement

categories.push: Exercises that involve pushing movements (chest, shoulders, triceps)
categories.pull: Exercises that involve pulling movements (back, biceps)
categories.legs: Exercises that primarily target lower body muscles
categories.core: Exercises that target abdominal and core muscles
